div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

img.alt: Parent Survey for Remote Learning Plan

h3.a: Parent Survey for Remote Learning Plan

div.p: As previously mentioned, students, staff and parents are going to be asked to share input on how our Remote Learning Program is performing. We would like to get your input, so we can upgrade and...
Good evening GK! We have a few updates to let you all know about! First of all, we are putting some surveys out on Wednesday. Students, staff and parents are going to be asked to share input on...

img.alt: A Message from the GK Administrative Team

h3.a: A Message from the GK Administrative Team

div.p: Dear Families and Students, Welcome to GK Schools Remote Learning Days! As you can see, we will be delivering meaningful opportunities for students to remain engaged in learning while staying...

We need your help! We are asking for parent feedback regarding our Remote Learning Program. Your feedback is crucial in analyzing how our plan is working, and what we need to do to make it even better. Click the link to take the survey: https://forms.gle/AXaW8ffbXQQPwWUq8

While our BUILDINGS are closed, all our #gkcogs are still LEARNING! School is what you make it! While SCHOOL looks different today than ever before, LEARNING is still happening! #ProudGKCogsGM #ILSchoolsStepUp view image
Welcome back #gkcogs ! I hope you all had a restful and relaxing Spring Break! Enjoy the day re-connecting with your teachers, friends, students and community! #ilschoolsstepup view image
Go to www.gkschools.org and look under news stories to see the latest information from the district on COVID - 19. #gkcogs

div.h4: All Genoa-Kingston school buildings are closed due to the COVID-19 pandemic.
However, school is still in session, and students are still learning!
